summary: This is a brief email from an individual at USANYS (likely U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York) to someone at ODAG (Office of the Deputy Attorney General) regarding the Epstein case. The sender asks if they have a transcript of a hearing, attaches a PDF, and indicates they will call shortly.

persons.name: Unknown
persons.context: The individual sending the email from USANYS, asking about a hearing transcript and attaching a PDF.

persons.name: Unknown
persons.context: The recipient at ODAG (Office of the Deputy Attorney General) being asked about the hearing transcript.

connections.description: Email correspondence between legal officials at USANYS and ODAG regarding case materials.

events.title: Email Request for Hearing Transcript
events.description: An email is sent from USANYS to ODAG inquiring about the availability of a transcript from a hearing, with an attached PDF.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 29, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.

Communication is between officials at USANYS (U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York) and ODAG (Office of the Deputy Attorney General), indicating high-level coordination on the Epstein case.
The subject references a hearing transcript, suggesting ongoing legal proceedings or investigations related to Epstein at that time.
An attachment named 'J8RpEPSf.pdf' is included, which likely contains relevant case documents.
The sender indicates they will call the recipient shortly, showing urgent or time-sensitive communication regarding the case.
